mapper.select: SELECT /* selectMatchStatusHistory */ ID , TITLE , AUTHOR , STATUS , CREATED_BY , CREATED_AT , MAIN_IMAGE FROM BOOK_HISTORY h JOIN BOOK b ON h.BOOK_ID = b.ID WHERE REQUESTED_USER = #{username} AND REQUESTED_STATUS = #{status}

SELECT BOOK_ID , REQUESTED_STATUS , STARTED_AT , ENDED_AT , REQUESTED_USER , REQUESTED_AT FROM BOOK_HISTORY h JOIN BOOK b ON h.BOOK_ID = b.id WHERE BOOK_ID = #{id} AND b.CREATED_BY = #{username} AND REQUESTED_STATUS IN ('WAIT_FOR_RESPONSE', 'ON_RESERVED') ORDER BY REQUESTED_AT ASC LIMIT 15
